import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'MyApp'; saludo = "Saludos desde Angular" app:number = 1 changeApp(n:number){ this.app = n } }
